body: this guy's stories are so random wtf doesn't make any sense lol
Bruh that satoru guy got some powerful hax
miyabi, as always, one of the best artists in the industry. Amazing work!
@Kangshichan I used to like napata’s work but now. It’s getting ridiculous how all of his girls still look the same.
Good shit dude I'm definitely comin back for more.

@CookOfDoom242

You want heartwarming?
Napata has more realistic body proportions and relatable stories. Mikuni mizuki is even better. The girls he draws are breath-takingly beautiful. Nanao is just as good. Miyabi is good, but his art isn't consistent, especially the faces, which tend to look different from various angles. Story is sometimes good, sometimes not. 

Art: mizuki=nanao>napata=miyabi

Story: mizuki>napata>nanao>miyabi
Fuckk. This is Gold y'know. This is one of the best for me. That last chapter, that's fucking hot cuz they're fucking like animal
On page 6, the "Ahh, yayoi-san" is pink when it should be blue.  At least, unless the girl is calling out her own name lol

I love how Miyabi does faces and some of the scenes just really seem kinetic, as though they're animated. The foreshortening is a bit off in places, but all in all, I love Miyabi's work, even if this one isn't quite as hot as  Junjou Shoujo Et Cetera was.
